content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 (10 ounce) can asparagus tips, drained" )

content.text: 1 (1 pound) loaf soft, sliced white bread
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "1 (1 pound) loaf soft, sliced white bread" )

content.text: 0) Set asparagus spears onto paper towels to absorb excess liquid.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Set"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "asparagus spears"@7:23 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-0-0 "paper towels"@29:41 / TOOL )
		:prp ( purp-0-0 "to absorb excess liquid"@42:65 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) In a small bowl, mix together the mayonnaise, onion and seasoning salt.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "mix"@20:23 / AC
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a small bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "the mayonnaise"@33:47 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "onion"@49:54 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "seasoning salt"@59:73 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Remove crusts from bread slices, and spread mayonnaise mixture thinly on each slice.
3) Place a spear onto the slice and roll up.
4) Cut each roll in half, and arrange on a serving tray.
5) Cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until serving.
